title: PBE
body: A while ago (Maybe S4 or S5) i recieved an email saying that i had been accepted for pbe etc. At the time however i had taken a break from the game so I didn't really care. However I got back into the game recently and went to go check my pbe status and it gives me an error 500. It seems that in 2014 others were having this problem but haven't seen anything recent. Any sort of feed back would help.

replies.body:
The PBE Page Error 500 usually indicates that there's something up with your ability to reach that page through standard network routing. You should be able to bypass this by using a VPN like [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us).

Let me know if this worked!
